Now, I will calculate the additional amount.

I will now compute the VAT and fee to be sent to Apple.

The original amount paid for the iPhone was $1000. 

19.5% of $1000 = 0.195 * 1000 = $195

Adding a fee of $5.29, the total additional amount is $195 + $5.29 = $200.29.

I will now send this additional amount to Apple.
